All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractComponent
Astract class that represents a base component for the entity.
AbstractEntity
Abstract class that represents a base entity.
AbstractItem
Abstract class that represents an item.
AbstractScene
Abstract class that represents a base scene for the application.
AbstractSystem
Abstract class that represents a system interacting with components.
AnimationComponent
Class that represents the animation component.
AnimationSystem
Class responsible of animations.
AttackComponent
Class that represents the attack component.
AttackPotion
Class that represents a attack bonus potion.
AttackSystem
Class responsible of attacks.
Camera
Class taht represent a game camera.
ColliderComponent
Classe qui represente un composant de collision.
CollisionBounds
Class that represents collision bounds of a box.
CollisionSystem
Class responsible of collisions.
CSVReader
Class responsible of reading .csv files.
DetectionComponent
Class that represents a detection bounds for the entity.
DetectionSystem
Class responsible of detections.
EndGameScene
Class responsible of endgame scene.
EntityManager
Class responsible of entity management.
FlagECS
Flag to tell if the component needs to be updated by the system.
Game
Class responsible of game logic.
GameMap
Class that represent Game map.
GameScene
Class responsible of gameplay scene.
HealthComponent
Class that represents health points of entity.
HealthPotion
Class that represents a health bonus potion.
HUD
Class representing th game HUD.
InsensitiveRing
Class that represents an insensitive ring, to go through specific map object.
Interactable
Interface for interaction between entities.
InteractComponent
Class that represents an interaction component.
InteractSystem
Class reponsible of interactions.
IntroScene
Class responsible of introduction scene.
InventoryComponent
Class that represents the inventory of the entity.
InventorySystem
Class responsible of inventory management.
Key
Class that represents a chest key.
KeyInputComponent
Class that represents possibles inputs for the entity.
KeyInputSystem
Class responsible of key inputs management in the game.
Main
Main class to launch the JavaFX application.
MapObject
Class that represents a map object.
Monster
Class that represents an enemy monster.
MovementComponent
Class that represents a movement component.
MovementSystem
Classe responsable de la gestion des mouvements.
NPC
Class that represents a Non Playable Character.
Player
Class that represents a player.
Point2D
Class that represents a point in 2D.
PoisonPotion
Class that represents a poison potion that kill a monster.
PositionComponent
Class that represents a positon component.
RenderSystem
Class responsible of rendering the game.
SceneManager
Class responsible of scenes management.
Settings
Class responsible of application and game settings.
Settings.Actions
Actions in the game.
Settings.AnimationState
Animation states.
Settings.App
Application settings.
Settings.DirPaths
Directory paths to access resources files.
Settings.GameStatus
Game status.
Settings.MapObjectsID
Map objects ID.
Settings.Movement
Movement settings.
Settings.Positions
Positions settings.
Settings.ResFiles
Resource file paths.
Settings.Sprites
Sprites settings.
Settings.Stats
Stats of game entities.
SpriteComponent
Class that represents a sprite component.
SystemManager
Class responsible of system management.
